constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 82 (Wednesday, May 12, 2021)]
[House]
[Pages H2271-H2272]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. TITUS:
H.R. 3166.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Pursuant to Article I, Section 8 of the United States
Constitution, the following statement is submitted regarding
the specific powers granted to Congress in the Constitution
to enact the accompanying bill or joint resolution.
[[Page H2272]]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

title: NURSE Act
